column4: WTF!!?! im reading code written by sony.. thats GPLed.. am I seeing things!? can somebody please pinch me and tell me I'm not dreaming ;)
i just cant believe that sony have released the extensions to linux to support the PS3.. under the GPL, i think thats incredible.. i can't wait to see ubuntu boot on one of these babies :)
i can provide link to download patches if you want :) .. or you can look in scrollback
